title: New: Family History – In Need (Demo)
content:
Some tracks are just made for the live stage.

Take one listen to Family History’s In Need, and try telling me that you can’t imagine them enchanting a couple of hundred people in a sweaty, claustrophobic venue, whilst strobe lights flash in time with the delirious synths. Based around a simple chord progression and LCD Soundsystem’s guide to writing electro-pop classics, there’s a level of understanding found on In Need that’s warmly refreshing. “All your friends are getting married and carried away” laments the lead singer in a respectably honest fashion. Dance your heart out kid.
